critique: This is an executive order that makes an exception to a rule about retirement age for a specific government employee. It is difficult to assess the document's position on the traditional left-right political spectrum. The document does not address immigration. The document expands the executive's reach by allowing the President to make exceptions to existing laws. The document does not address federalism. The document does not address national security or civil liberties. The document does not address economic regulation. The document does not address social inclusion.
